str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: (lit: I am sober), I am calm (vigilant), circumspect. Of uncertain affinity: to abstain from wine, i.e. be discreet.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To put on, clothe (another). From en and duno; to invest with clothing.
A breast-plate, corslet, cuirass. Of uncertain affinity; the chest, i.e. a corslet.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
A helmet. Feminine of a compound of peri and kephale; encirclement of the head, i.e. A helmet.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.
